EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Charlotte Farmer (1340032238.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Charlotte Farmer (1340032238.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Charlotte, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Steve Arhancet. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Steve has brought me up to speed on your background but if you would like to set up a time to chat you may go here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. We also greatly appreciate the lead you may be sending our way per your message below. I look forward to workign with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: charlotte farmer [mailto:farmer.charlotte@gmail.com] <mailto:[mailto:farmer.charlotte@gmail.com]> Sent: Friday, June 15, 2012 1:21 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Charlotte Farmer Hi Steve! Great to hear from you. Thanks for following up with me.I am pointing a high potential individual your way. Kind regards,C
On Friday, June 15, 2012, Steve Arhancet wrote: Dear Charlotte, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Steven___________________________________Steve ArhancetDirector, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6011f: 703.793.6081e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com <javascript:_e(%7b%7d,%20>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0xOTMmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTE5MyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODgxODMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4MjcyNTAmZW1haWxpZD1mYXJtZXIuY2hhcmxvdHRlQGdtYWlsLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjAwMjYtMTEwMzAwNi0xJmV4dHJhPSYmJg==&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56uwuWaewlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
-- Take Care, Charlotte
